title: Nets Suspend Kyrie Irving Indefinitely After Antisemitic Movie Post
description: Irving posted a link to an antisemitic movie last week but had not apologized until hours after the Nets suspended him for a minimum of five games.
dc:creator: Tania Ganguli
media:description: Nets guard Kyrie Irving distanced himself from some of the false assertions made in an antisemitic movie he linked to on Twitter last week.
